solution_line_template: Dividing both sides by {coefficient_m_equation}, we get m = <<{num_phone_messages}={num_phone_messages}>>{num_phone_messages}

Substituting this value back into the equation e = {emails_multiplier_m}m - {emails_less_than}, we get e = {emails_multiplier_m} * {num_phone_messages} - {emails_less_than} = {intermediate_product_9m} - {emails_less_than} = {num_emails}
